projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
The Map.Module.Route object has a width parameter of type Number.

Parameter Description: Line width in pixels to use when drawing the route.

It would be great if support was added for density-independent pixels as the route width appears much smaller/thinner on higher resolution Android devices than it does on lower res devices.
fields.summary: Modules.Map - support density independent pixels for route width
